###############################
###############################
########## BELLAKARI ##########
###############################
###############################

##Second Age Begins in 593, Third Age begins in 4033##

#### Tumakveh Dynasty ####
## The Kings of Bellakar
## The Pretender-Kings of Bellazen

### Lords of Bellakar ###
# Lords of Korlea
# Line of Ishtraraza, Lords of Bur Esmer, stewards of the Ishra Cult
# Lords of Urezayan
# Lords of Har Shulam
# Lords of Siresani

### Royal Line of Bellakar ###
lineoftumakveh1 = { # Originator of the Tumakveh Lineage.
	name = Tumak
	
	dynasty = dynasty_tumakveh	
	religion = faith_ladnoca
    culture = bellanarud
						
	trait = intellect_good_3
    trait = beauty_good_2	
	trait = education_diplomacy_4
	trait = just
	trait = gregarious
	trait = temperate
	trait = family_first	

	3599.1.1 = {			
		birth = yes		
	}			
	3677.7.7 = { 		
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
	}			
}

# lineoftumakveh1wife, wife of Tumak and mother of Tamar

lineoftumakveh2 = { # Bêlzagar's Bellanarud Grandmother. Daughter of Tumak.
	name = Tamar
    female = yes
	
	dynasty = dynasty_tumakveh	
	religion = faith_ladnoca
    culture = bellanarud
	father = lineoftumakveh1
						
	trait = intellect_good_2
    trait = beauty_good_3	

	3625.3.4 = {			
		birth = yes		
	}			
	3701.7.23 = { 		
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
	}			
}

lineoftumakveh2husband = { # Bêlzagar's Númenórean Grandfather.
	name = Be_e_lzagar
	
	religion = faith_numenorean
    culture = numenorean
						
			
	trait = intellect_good_1					
	trait = born_on_numenor
    trait = blood_of_numenor_9
	3631.4.21 = {			
		birth = yes		
	}
    3650.1.1 = {			
		add_spouse = lineoftumakveh2		
	}
	3892.3.9 = { 		
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
	}			
}

lineoftumakveh4 = { # Bêlzagar, Famous General in the Mûlkherite War around the time of the Downfall.
	name = Be_e_lzagar	

	dynasty = dynasty_tumakveh		
	religion = faith_old_bellakarean
    culture = bellakaze
	
	father = lineoftumakveh3
	mother = lineoftumakveh3wife
			
	diplomacy = 8		
	martial = 12
	stewardship = 8
	prowess = 20			
			
	trait = intellect_good_2		
	trait = education_martial_4			
	trait = brave			
	trait = calm			
	trait = stubborn
	trait = strategist
	trait = lifestyle_mariner

    trait = blood_of_numenor_6
	3720.10.13 = {			
		birth = yes		
		effect = {	
    		add_trait_xp = {
				trait = lifestyle_mariner
				value = 50
			}
        }
	}			
	3921.11.11 = { 		
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
	}			
}

# lineoftumakveh4wife, wife of Belzagar, mother of Imruzir

		}

}

#lineoftumakveh27wife (sister of lineoftumakveh26wife)

lineoftumakveh28 = { # Barûthhîn, first daughter of Narkurzir the Eruist, Wife of Tarannon Falastur and Queen of Gondor as Beruthiel
    name = Baru_u_thhi_i_n
    female = yes

	dynasty = dynasty_tumakveh
	religion = faith_ishtra
	culture = bellakaze
    dna = beruthiel_tumakveh_dna
	
    father = lineoftumakveh26
	mother = lineoftumakveh26wife

	trait = cynical
	trait = sadistic
    trait = shy

    diplomacy = 4
    martial = 7
    stewardship = 14
    intrigue = 10 # One for every cat
    learning = 12
    prowess = 4

    trait = education_intrigue_4
    trait = depressed_1
	
    trait = blood_of_numenor_3
	4791.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
    4831.1.1 = { # Marriage to King Tarannon of Gondor
        name = Ber_uthiel 
        set_relation_grudge = character:lineofanarion15 # Why did you take me from my homeland! I will never love you...
    }
	4936.1.1 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_natural_causes 
		}	
	}
}

### Lords of Urezayan ### 
lineofinzilur1 = { # Inzilzu_u_r of Urezayan, childhood friend of I_I_shtrazimbel I - ennobled from his courtly position after the previous lords of Urezayan were assassinated, charged with defense of the west and the wrangling of the chaotic situation there
	name = Inzilzu_u_r
	
	dynasty = dynasty_urezayan
    religion = faith_infinite_wisdom
    culture = bellakarani

    sexuality = heterosexual

    trait = brave
    trait = honest
    trait = diligent
	trait = beauty_good_1
	trait = strong

    diplomacy = 7
    martial = 6
    stewardship = 10
    intrigue = 8
    learning = 4
    prowess = 7

    trait = education_stewardship_4

    6077.3.29 = {
        birth = yes
    }
	6094.1.1 = {
        #Autonomy of Urezayan declared. Charged with defense of the western passes into Felaya, made exempt from taxation and levees.
        effect = {
            vassal_contract_set_obligation_level = {
                type = title_revocation_rights
                level = 1
            }
			vassal_contract_set_obligation_level = { 
				type = feudal_government_taxes 
				level = 1
			}
			vassal_contract_set_obligation_level = { 
				type = feudal_government_levies 
				level = 1
			} 
        }
    }
	6099.2.9 = {
		add_spouse = lineofinzilur1wife
	}
    6162.8.21 = {
        death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
    }
}
lineofinzilur1wife = {
    name = Zi_i_ra_a_neth
    female = yes

    culture = bellakarani

    sexuality = heterosexual

    trait = compassionate
    trait = diligent
    trait = temperate

    trait = education_diplomacy_4

    6078.2.3 = {
        birth = yes

	dynasty = dynasty_thonuzir
    religion = faith_path_of_wisdom
    culture = soriyan

    sexuality = heterosexual

    trait = diligent
    trait = just
    trait = generous
	trait = brave
	trait = administrator
	trait = lifestyle_blademaster

    diplomacy = 5
    martial = 8
    stewardship = 8
    intrigue = 6
    learning = 6
    prowess = 8

    trait = education_martial_4

	4940.12.24 = {
		birth = yes
	}

		add_spouse = lineofthonuzir2
	}

    }
}

    intrigue = 4
    learning = 7
    prowess = 6

    }

		give_nickname = nick_the_valiant

lininzilloniadventurer1 = { # Lowborn adventurer travelling with lineofsujanir_adventurer
    name = Kadarzagar

    religion = faith_edain_ulmo
    culture = kharadunaim

    sexuality = heterosexual

    trait = gluttonous
    trait = fickle
    trait = gregarious
	
	trait = lifestyle_traveler
    trait = lifestyle_physician
	trait = comfort_eater
	
	
    diplomacy = 9
    martial = 3
    stewardship = 6
    intrigue = 6
    learning = 6
    prowess = 3

    trait = education_learning_3

    6987.6.12 = {
        birth = yes
    }
	
	7014.9.13 = {
        effect = {
			add_character_flag = no_auto_family
			add_trait_xp = {
				trait = lifestyle_traveler
				track = travel
				value = 55
			}
			add_trait_xp = {
				trait = lifestyle_physician
				value = 60
			}
			learn_language = language_westron_south
        }
    }

    #7030.1.1 = {
    #    employer = lineofsujanir_adventurer
    #}
	
    7038.2.14 = {
        death = { death_reason = death_drowned }
    }
}

    learning = 10
    prowess = 3

	trait = lifestyle_traveler
    trait = lifestyle_physician
	trait = intellect_good_1

        birth = yes

    }

             value = 69

            trait = lifestyle_traveler
            track = travel
            value = 22
        }

lineofelentirohin1 = {
    name = Elentir

    dynasty = dynasty_elentirohin
    religion = faith_numenorean
    culture = numenorean

    father = ciryandurextension88
    mother = lineofelentirold38

    sexuality = heterosexual

    trait = blood_of_numenor_10
    trait = born_on_numenor

    trait = brave
    trait = honest
    trait = fickle

	trait = lifestyle_mariner
	trait = lifestyle_traveler

    diplomacy = 12
    martial = 14
    stewardship = 13
    intrigue = 14
    learning = 9
    prowess = 12

    trait = education_diplomacy_4

    3844.7.26 = {
        birth = yes
    }
	3901.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_trait_xp = {
				trait = lifestyle_traveler
				track = travel
				value = 100
			}
			add_trait_xp = {
				trait = lifestyle_mariner
				value = 100
			}			
		}	
	}

    3910.1.1 = {
        give_nickname = nick_the_south_star
        effect = {
            add_character_flag = {
                flag = had_nickname_event
            }
        }   
    }
    3911.3.5 = {
        add_spouse = ciryandurextension61
 		effect = {
			set_relation_lover = { reason = lover_history target = character:ciryandurextension61 }
            set_relation_soulmate = { reason = lover_history target = character:ciryandurextension61 }
		}  		
    }

    4128.3.8 = {
        death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
    }
}
